商品名稱: KYKU Funky Hawaiian 男款襯衫 棕櫚海灘襯衫 熱帶度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: Flamingo Green
留言內容: I am 5'11/220lbs with a larger than average chest size for my height I and need to try things on to see if I need an L or an XL as nothing is standard about how shirts are made. I bought a Large and an Extra Large. The Large is a perfect fit for me.  Relaxed fit, not too long and perfect across my shoulders.  This isn't an expensive shirt, so I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the sewing at the seams and buttonholes. Very nice buttons as well, and it came with an extra button attached to the tag.

商品名稱: KYKU Funky Hawaiian 男款襯衫 棕櫚海灘襯衫 熱帶度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: 5X-Large顏色: Flamingo Green
留言內容: My husband really likes his new Tropical design shirt, it fits great and the design is fantastic.  It is made very well and I like it because you can wash it and do not have to iron it.  Great product! gb

SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: Purple
留言內容: The shirt is very vibrant and looks just as shown in the pictures. I think it's a tad small for a Medium but I didn't want to risk it on a large. The only real grievance I had was with the buttons/holes. There were a few where the threads of the holes got looped around the buttons and I needed to use a small knife to cut them or risk pulling the button off the shirt. Not a huge deal, just be careful when removing this shirt from the packaging and unbuttoning for the first time.EDIT: The shirt was returned due to buttons coming off after the first wash and increased fraying around the button holes. Absolutely loved the colors and design, though.

商品名稱: KYKU Funky Hawaiian 男款襯衫 棕櫚海灘襯衫 熱帶度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: 3X-Large顏色: Graffiti Multicolor
留言內容: This shirt looks great, the material is so-so but is fine, but the biggest hiccup is the sizing. I ordered a 3XL thinking the shirt would be a little large, I like my larger fits for comfort, but this thing is skin tight. I usually wear a 2XL for form fitting. This fits like a 1.5XL. Hachi matchi do I feel like a bozo. I’ll just have to shed some lbs because I love the style. Tight around the arms, chest and gut (I’m 3X remember).Regarding material, it feels like a windbreaker without the insulation. I feel after a handful of washes, it’ll definitely soften up. Feels smooth as silk, if silk was plastic.Overall, I’m definitely buying a handful more designs, I’m just going to order up a size or two. Play around with the sizing over the next month or so and come back with more results.

商品名稱: KYKU Funky Hawaiian 男款襯衫 棕櫚海灘襯衫 熱帶度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: 3X-Large顏色: Colourful
留言內容: I bought a 3xl which usually swims on me and are plenty long enough. This shirt was much smaller in every way. Shorter to the point that it pulls above your waist when you raise your arms. Chest is tight causing buttons to pucker in normal wear. Waist is barely OK when standing and unacceptable when sitting. Arms fit like a T shirt. It wraps completely around my biceps uncomfortably tight.The shirt itself uses good fabric and the sugar skull pattern is very good. The prettiest one I found.As long as you know these run very small and you need to go up at least one size, I actually recommend this shirt. Very well made and attractive. I'm debating on buying a 5x vs 4x as a replacement as it runs that small. My wife wears the 3x.

商品名稱: KYKU Funky Hawaiian 男款襯衫 棕櫚海灘襯衫 熱帶度假襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: Abstract Pattern
留言內容: Can't pay $20 for a shirt and expect it to be an $85 shirt.  This shirt is OK for what it cost.  Fit is great!  Color is vibrant. Pay attention to the size chart.  A lot of people complain about the fit when they actually just ordered the wrong size.  The chart is there for you.  Just because your other shirt is an XL does not mean you need this one in XL. KNOW YOUR MEASUREMENTS before you order.
